ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] A run of luck
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I would ve bowed out too, but I couldn t figure out a politic way to do it because Melodi was there too.  Well, if I win, I ll let Avon take it ?  Sounds
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 20 Mar 2000, Reeves, Patrick W wrote:
>
> Doh your right, I forgot about my lute :) Actually I wanted to bow out of
> the glove lotto, but Myth jumped the gun and lotto'd before I could say so.
> Regardless they should have gone to Avon with out a lotto, as it was the
> last next to last piece she needed for a full set.

I would've bowed out too, but I couldn't figure out a politic
way to do it because Melodi was there too. "Well, if I win,
I'll let Avon take it"? Sounds like I'm dissing Melodi.

> The outfit that got me the most inspections/tells was full steel. It is a
> great look on wood elves.

It was a bit too bland for my tastes.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
